description:
OpenAI CEO Sam Altman’s Worldcoin project has launched a developer preview of World Chain, a new blockchain that claims to prioritise humans and scale with the growth of the Worldcoin ecosystem.  World Chain – built on the OP Stack and integrated with the Worldcoin protocol – aims to provide developers with access to over 10... Read more »

The post Sam Altman’s blockchain project ‘World Chain’ opens to developers appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Sam Altman’s blockchain project ‘World Chain’ opens to developers
